item.title: What do you think of the OB from Mars sound pack?
item.dc:creator: Aadam
item.description:
I know I‚Äôm late, but this is finally a useful pack.

Raver and Tom Sawyer are LEGENDARY

Although there‚Äôs many instruments like Tom Sawyer already in sweet pads that are better, Tom Sawyer sounds truly unique comparing them.

Raver‚Ä¶is next level. I would‚Äôve never expected anything like raver to come out! Not just is raver a legendary lead, you can use it as a bass that sound really cool as well.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of the OB from Mars sound pack?

item.title: What do you think of the OB from Mars sound pack?
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Back on topic‚Ä¶

Are sound packs sample-based or entirely synthesised?

I just felt that the sounds in this pack sounded quite like variants of sounds from other packs. Or at least, they have an ‚ÄòAuxy sound‚Äô, imo.

I was surprised and pleased to see Shape (Decay?) make a reappearance. I just wish it was available for all sounds (as Decay).

I like that there are retro packs (I‚Äôm a fan of the sound of classic analogue synths), but it feels like there‚Äôs a whole suite of sounds and timbres that we‚Äôre not really getting.
(Not sure if that‚Äôs a licensing cost thing or a synth engine capabilities thing.)

At this point, I don‚Äôt feel that sound packs have been adding huge amounts of value. I‚Äôm really only subbing to Auxy now to have access to the many many sketches and semi-developed tracks in there that I intend to develop further in the future.

[Edit: I should add that I‚Äôm not suggesting that we could end sound pack releases. I think they need to continue, but I‚Äôd like to see the variety and quality increase ‚Äî though I‚Äôm not sure either is likely to happen unless/until they raise the subs price (which I‚Äôd be in favour of, if it leads to more interesting selection of sounds, substantial new features, etc‚Ä¶)]

Read full topic

Moving on‚Ä¶

item.source: What do you think of the OB from Mars sound pack?

item.title: What do you think of the OB from Mars sound pack?
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Auxy:

Which names are repeated?

Sorry, but wow. Really?

Someone at Auxy should be paying attention to these things before they ship. This is 101 stuff.

  1. You didn‚Äôt immediately recognise the duplicate name and rule it out before release - bc you know your own product inside and out, right?
  2. When the mistake was identified, you asked a user to identify the specifics, rather than take two mins to check for yourself (for a mistake that wouldn‚Äôt have happened if Auxy had the right processes or if anyone was paying attention)

Sure, it wasn‚Äôt a huge one, but it kinda suggests that Team Auxy are kinda phoning it in these days.

 
(Haven‚Äôt used it yet, but when I first saw the new kit, and the repeated names, my first thought was whether projects will correctly identify which instrument is meant to be used.)

Read full topic
